name: Quickshipper Inc.
description: Developer of a fleet management platform designed to assist businesses in managing their deliveries efficiently. The company's platform helps businesses boost their fleet productivity by providing necessary tools for daily operations as well as offering optimal roots to deliver the products, enabling shopping businesses to enhance their productivity.
